title: Forgotten Things at the End of the Year?
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>I’m glad we managed to buy one~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yeah, we can’t welcome new years without this, after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Has your family finished house cleaning, Shioriko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes. My family progressed little by little since the start of December, and we finish before Christmas<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I see. Then, we can take a little detour, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Detour....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>There’s a store that serves really delicious sweet sake near the shrine that Nozomi-chan helps out on. How about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Sweet sake! I really like it! I want to go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, I’m glad. It’s cold, so let’s go warm ourselves up<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
